EmailTemplate.name: 201911_Global_HoneywellForgePTMD_KK.Honeywell Forge now includes PTMD - Rest
EmailTemplate.subject: PTMD migration to Honeywell Forge [COMPLETED]
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace1.honeywell.com/]]> Your PTMD migration is now completed! In follow-up to our prior communication, we are in the process of migrating our Predictive Trend Monitoring and Diagnostics (PTMD) solution into Honeywell Forge. Note: there is no additional cost associated with the transition to Honeywell Forge.We have completed the migration of your company's assets into the new application that is part of Honeywell Forge. Our Honeywell PTMD support team will be available if you have any questions about the transition process. See below for details.You can log in to your new PTMD app right away:
- Visit: https://aerospace1.honeywell.com/ <[[https://aerospace1.honeywell.com/]]> - Launch Connected Maintenance - User name: use your existing user name - Password: use your existing password
You can start using the system immediately:
- You can view this presentation that covers the familiar features in the new interface - Access the system and log problems with your data - Explore the new interface and note any inconsistencies
Please spend at least 30 minutes with the new application to identify possible issues specific to your system. If any issues arise, please reach out to our support team below:
Airline Region
Honeywell Forge - PTMD Support
Contact email
EMEAI
Heiner Bruns

This message was sent to {{lead.Email Address:default=NA}}. If you don't want to receive these emails from Honeywell in the future, you can edit your profile <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/AERO_Preference_Center.html]]> or unsubscribe <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Email_Confirmation_OptOut.html]]>.
